title: Provide Performance Feedback Response
description: Response payload for provide_performance_feedback task. Returns either success confirmation OR error information, never both.

oneOf.title: ProvidePerformanceFeedbackSuccess
oneOf.description: Success response - feedback received and processed

success.description: Whether the performance feedback was successfully received

sandbox.description: When true, this response contains simulated data from sandbox mode.

context.title: Context Object
context.description: Opaque correlation data that is echoed unchanged in responses. Used for internal tracking, UI session IDs, trace IDs, and other caller-specific identifiers that don't affect protocol behavior. Context data is never parsed by AdCP agents - it's simply preserved and returned.

ext.title: Extension Object
ext.description: Extension object for platform-specific, vendor-namespaced parameters. Extensions are always optional and must be namespaced under a vendor/platform key (e.g., ext.gam, ext.roku). Used for custom capabilities, partner-specific configuration, and features being proposed for standardization.

oneOf.title: ProvidePerformanceFeedbackError
oneOf.description: Error response - feedback rejected or could not be processed

errors.description: Array of errors explaining why feedback was rejected (e.g., invalid measurement period, missing campaign data)

items.title: Error
items.description: Standard error structure for task-specific errors and warnings

field.description: Field path associated with the error (e.g., 'packages[0].targeting')

retry_after.description: Seconds to wait before retrying the operation
